text: Hi there! Is there a way to customize the knowledge base template? There’s a login link at the top right corner of the page and I would like to adjust or remove it because it links to a HubSpot sign in form. We don’t need this. We just want to use the knowledge base for our FAQ.
Is there any way to customize template/module using Hubl and contact properties? For example, to personalize the page based on  or not the users is a known contact?
